1.title: Green It Forums
1.description: A Reddit-based forum app that allows users to post content, comment, and vote. Viewed links turn green! The frontend is written with React, and the backend uses Node.js/Express, and MongoDB

2.title: SWAPI Planetary Navigator
2.description: A navigator to the SWAPI api. Written using angular.

3.title: Tower of Hanoi
3.description: The classic Tower of Hanoi game. Written using jQuery.
